for IN3-Servers"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"calcUnregisterDeposit(uint256)":{"notice":"calculates the minimum deposit you need to pay in order to request unregistering of a server."},"cancelUnregisteringServer(uint256)":{"notice":"this function must be called by the owner to cancel the unregister-process. if the caller is not the owner, then he will also get the deposit paid by the caller."},"confirmUnregisteringServer(uint256)":{"notice":"this function must be called by the caller of the requestUnregisteringServer-function after 28 days if the owner did not cancel, the caller will receive 20% of the server deposit + his own deposit. the owner will receive 80% of the server deposit before the server will be removed."},"convict(uint256,bytes32,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"convicts a server that signed a wrong blockhash"},"registerServer(string,uint256)":{"notice":"register a new Server with the sender as owner    "},"requestUnregisteringServer(uint256)":{"notice":"this should be called before unregistering a server. there are 2 use cases: a) the owner wants to stop offering the service and remove the server.    in this case he has to wait for one hour before actually removing the server.     This is needed in order to give others a chance to convict it in case this server signs wrong hashes b) anybody can request to remove a server because it has been inactive.    in this case he needs to pay a small deposit, which he will lose "},"totalServers()":{"notice":"length of the serverlist"},"updateServer(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"updates a Server by adding the msg.value to the deposit and setting the props    "}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/contracts/ServerRegistry.sol":"ServerRegistry"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/contracts/BlockhashRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x07ab64b17d865bd21f94a156171cd49f103274055c75c0628065c07b1ffde1f6","urls":["bzzr://665dafc29a3883d2e485e16dcc9e993135078ebea1d0ed26a434e6d51222c142"]},"/contracts/ServerRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd46b4467aa4c22adf30a7b84eafe4c7019da0d6050ad5becdff0c0fb0a388afc","urls":["bzzr://5971f3e82ee4d0b0d61591a82537680fa60d0ccb01cf93407bf566f90832407e"]}},"version":1}
